title: Journey To The Afterlife - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/7/18
itunes:title: Journey To The Afterlife - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 8/7/18
description:
George Noory and psychic medium Kristy Robinett explore her work communicating with dead spirits, and examine the differences between Heaven, Hell and Purgatory.
